name: Moonlight Summons
prerequisiteFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_i OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_ii OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_iii OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_iv OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_v OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_vi OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_vii OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_viii OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_ix)
descriptionText: Your summoned minions are infused with the power of the moon.
benefitText: Creatures you summon shed light as a light spell. They are immune to confusion and sleep effects, and their natural weapons are treated as silver for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
